data.eml:eml: A new species of Axymyiidae (Diptera) from western North America and a key to the Nearctic species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fitzgerald, Scott J., Wood, D. Monty (2014): A new species of Axymyiidae (Diptera) from western North America and a key to the Nearctic species. Zootaxa 3857 (1): 101-113, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3857.1.4
